.github/scripts/
├── modules/
│   ├── __init__.py
│   ├── orchestrator/          # High-level workflow orchestration
│   │   ├── __init__.py
│   │   ├── package_builder.py  # Main PackageBuilder class (slimmed)
│   │   └── workflow_runner.py  # Execution flow coordination
│   ├── build/                 # Package building logic
│   │   ├── __init__.py
│   │   ├── aur_builder.py     # AUR-specific building
│   │   ├── local_builder.py   # Local package building
│   │   ├── version_manager.py # Version comparison/extraction
│   │   └── dependency_handler.py # Dependency resolution
│   ├── repo/                  # Repository management
│   │   ├── __init__.py
│   │   ├── state_manager.py   # Pacman.conf and repo state
│   │   ├── database_manager.py # Database operations
│   │   └── cleanup_manager.py # Zero-residue cleanup logic
│   ├── vps/                   # Remote operations
│   │   ├── __init__.py
│   │   ├── ssh_client.py      # SSH operations (from vps_client.py)
│   │   ├── rsync_client.py    # Rsync operations (from vps_client.py)
│   │   └── upload_manager.py  # Upload orchestration
│   ├── common/                # Shared utilities
│   │   ├── __init__.py
│   │   ├── config_loader.py   # Configuration management
│   │   ├── shell_executor.py  # Command execution
│   │   ├── environment.py     # Environment validation
│   │   └── logging_utils.py   # Logging configuration
│   └── gpg/                   # GPG operations
│       ├── __init__.py
│       └── gpg_handler.py     # (Already exists, keep as is)
├── builder.py                 # Entry point (refactored, minimal)
├── checker.py
├── config.py
└── packages.py
